description: This file contains the implementation of the AnalyticsService class which provides analytical data retrieval functionalities such as summary and time series data for social media metrics, using Entity Framework Core for data access.

classes.name: AnalyticsService
classes.description: Provides methods to retrieve analytics summaries and time series data for social media accounts using Entity Framework Core.

methods.name: GetSummaryAsync
methods.description: Returns an aggregated summary of social media metrics for a given user.

methods.name: GetTimeSeriesAsync
methods.description: Returns time series data for specified social media metrics within optional date range filters.
